column4: you can't use updates from one version of ubuntu with another version, if that's what you're trying to do
cellojoe : hers was installed from an ubuntu 6.10 cd, i want to install with the same cd and user her updates
it probably won't work. you'd be better off connecting to the internet for a little while to get the updates
cellojoe : we are on a limited bandwidth connection, using her updates would save use some time bandwidth quota
